With this Core series I have reached my current possibilities, I am not able to add more units on a processor. In this series I upgraded the connectors inside the core to gold ones, because gold have much better conductivity.
I reached another improvement by adding a build-in unit for the processing and the output of Support data. This extremely relieved the unspecified part of the processor.
Hint: Refer "Standart Core" for general informations.
